content: lion brand stitchfinder knit nature motif blue tit bird materials a white yarn b blue yarn c black yarn d olive yarn e yellow yarn 4 double-pointed needles batting fiber-fill 2 black beads soft jewelry-making wire small pliers optional lion brand note this bird should not be used as a toy but it could be made without legs and with french knots for eyes to make it safe for young children *directions reproduced with permission from 75 birds butterflies & little beasts to knit and crochet st martin s press 2011* 1 http //www lionbrand com/faq/551 html
